page.title: 13TRADE
page.content: Ther is very trade AGRICULURAL MERCHANTS: Patullo Higgs are at Hast Hil. They supply farms with all their needs eg.fertilizers and seed but not machinery.They are the largest seed potatoe nerchants,the potatoes are grown in Ireland and Scotland.They supply local authorities wth fertilizer and grass seed. GARDEN CENTER:Reuths Nurseries have a branch in the area selling mainly shrubs.They have been very succesful at Chelsea Flower Show winning several Gold Medals. FRUIT:Keston Fruit Farm sends Comice and Confederate pears and 13 types of apples to Covent Garden,Borough Market and Weston International. The rest is used for cider production. HORSES:A prosperous trade with several people making a living out of them.
